flawed_nl_solution:
Cassy can pack 12 x 10 = <<12*10=120>>120 jars of jam in the 10 boxes.
She can also pack 10 x 30 = <<10*30=300>>300 jars of jam in the 30 boxes.
A total of 300 + 120 = <<300+120=240>>240 jars of jam can be packed in the boxes.
So, 500 - 240 = <<500-240=260>>260 jars of jam will be left unpacked.
#### 260

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 420, not 240. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
